entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
